content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23683,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5233c39a-5c68-49b8-8143-b217c1cb7858/QE_onboarding_12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5233c39a-5c68-49b8-8143-b217c1cb7858/QE_onboarding_12.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_12.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5233c39a-5c68-49b8-8143-b217c1cb7858\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":529,\"height\":155},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Today it is difficult to imagine a project that would not need automated testing along with traditional manual testing. Test automation engineers often have to do some tests manually, while manual testers must improve their skills and start automating tests on projects. That is why, in 2020, a discipline that combines manual and automated testing was born at Epam and engineers who combine manual and automated testing have got a clear career path. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Trends in software testing are gradually shifting from manual testing to test automation. EPAM customers are now increasingly looking for specialists with versatile skills who can do both. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Considering that manual testing will be in demand for a long time, a discipline was created that combines manual and automated testing - Software Quality Engineering (SQE). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The transition to this discipline is available to engineers from the middle level and above. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To become a Software Quality Engineer, you need to master automation, that is, learn a programming language (Java, Python, JS, etc.) or so-called codeless and scriptless tools (automation with or without a minimum amount of code).  \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The easiest way to become an SQE is to study VIVIDUS (an EPAM product) and enter a project using it. Tosca is another useful framework developed by Tricentis (partner of EPAM). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On the scheme, you can see and compare different areas of testing and skills required for each of them. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"font-size\":\"11.0pt\",\"font-family\":null,\"mso-ascii-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"\\\"Yu Mincho\\\"\",\"mso-fareast-theme-font\":\"minor-fareast\",\"mso-hansi-theme-font\":\"minor-latin\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Arial\",\"mso-bidi-theme-font\":\"minor-bidi\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":26832,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fb7e4ceb-d401-4755-8679-fe814d9b6675/QE_onboarding_13.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/fb7e4ceb-d401-4755-8679-fe814d9b6675/QE_onboarding_13.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"QE_onboarding_13.png\",\"name\":\"QE_onboarding_13.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"fb7e4ceb-d401-4755-8679-fe814d9b6675\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":574,\"height\":252},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn
